definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: To examine and approve the annual plans of commemorative and special stamps;
sentences.chinese: 負責審定紀念郵票和特種郵票年度計劃。

sentences.english: This commemorative stamp is hereby printed to mark the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Civil Aviation of China.
sentences.chinese: 爲紀念新中國民航成立60週年，特印刷此紀念郵票。

sentences.english: A: Great. Show me some commemorative stamps, please.
sentences.chinese: 好極了，請給我看些紀念郵票。

sentences.english: Day, the Hungarian Post Company signed a new constitution for the issuance of commemorative stamps.
sentences.chinese: 當天，匈牙利郵政公司爲新憲法的簽署發行紀念郵票。

sentences.english: Do you have the memorial postage stamps for the bicentenary ?
sentences.chinese: 你們有二百週年的紀念郵票嗎？

sentences.english: Uruguay issued a set of Beijing Olympics-themed postal stamps Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉圭22日發行一套北京奧運主題紀念郵票。

sentences.english: People are lining up to buy commemoration stamps.
sentences.chinese: 人們正在排隊購買紀念郵票。

sentences.english: I have accrued a set of commemoration stamps.
sentences.chinese: 我已收集一套紀念郵票。

sentences.english: The new commemorative stamps are all sold out.
sentences.chinese: 這版新紀念郵票全都賣完了。

sentences.english: The new commemorative stamps will be put on sale next week.
sentences.chinese: 新的紀念郵票將於下星期發售。

sentences.english: Great. Show me some commemorative stamps , please.
sentences.chinese: 好極了，請給我看些紀念郵票。
有紀念郵票和普通郵票。

sentences.english: I'd like to have a set of Commemorative Stamps.
If you happen to be going to the post office, please get me some commemorative stamps.
sentences.chinese: 你上郵局的話，捎帶給我買幾張紀念郵票。

sentences.english: The new commemorative stamps are all sold out.

definition: items issued by a postal service and collected by philatelists (stamps, postcards, first day covers etc)
(of an organization etc) standing or permanent

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4
